logic.money.tax

Interface Tax

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Assurances, PensionTax, TestPeriod

    public interface Tax

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Money applyTax(Money sum)
      Applying taxes is never beneficial to the person.
      java.lang.String getDescription() 
      Money revertTax(Money sum)
      Reverting taxes should be beneficial for the tax payer.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns:
        description String with basic tax implementation description. Can contain references to external sources

      • applyTax

        Money applyTax(Money sum)
        Applying taxes is never beneficial to the person. After using that method money has to be change in favour of publican.
        Parameters:
        sum -
        Returns:
        sum New sum of Money that is worse for the tax target (payer);

      • revertTax

        Money revertTax(Money sum)
        Reverting taxes should be beneficial for the tax payer. Ex. Employee will gain money, Employer will have lower costs of the employment
        Parameters:
        sum -
        Returns:
        New sum of Money that is better for the tax target (payer);
